trans-unit.source: Contains information that enables a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> to resolve a data binding to either the property of an object or the property of the current object in a list of objects.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo> is returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingMemberInfo%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo> is created from the string passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo"></xref> class.

A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo> is created automatically when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.%23ctor%2A> constructor with a control-property name, data source, and navigation path.
The `dataMember` parameter contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> string.
A navigation path that resolves to either the property of an object or the property of the current object in a list of objects.
Gets the property name of the data-bound object.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A> is the last item found in the navigation path returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> property.

For example, if a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> is created that has a `dataMember` parameter of "Customers.custToOrders.OrderDate", <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> will return "OrderDate".
The property name of the data-bound object.
This can be an empty string ("").
Gets the information that is used to specify the property name of the data-bound object.

A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo> is created automatically when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.%23ctor%2A> constructor with a control-property name, data source, and navigation path.
The `dataMember` parameter contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> string.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> is the period delimitated combination of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A> values.

For example, when a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> is created by using a `dataMember` parameter of "Customers.custToOrders.OrderDate", <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> will return "Customers.custToOrders.OrderDate".
An empty string (""), a single property name, or a hierarchy of period-delimited property names that resolves to the property name of the final data-bound object.
Gets the property name, or the period-delimited hierarchy of property names, that comes before the property name of the data-bound object.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A> is the period delimitated combination of property names that comes before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A> in the navigational path returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> property.

For example, when a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> is created that has a `dataMember` parameter of "Customers.custToOrders.OrderDate", <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A> will return "Customers.custToOrders".
The property name, or the period-delimited hierarchy of property names, that comes before the data-bound object property name.
Determines whether the specified object is equal to this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> strings are compared with a culture setting of <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A>.
The object to compare for equality.
`true` if otherObject is a and both strings are equal; otherwise `false`.
Returns the hash code for this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo"></xref>.
The hash code for this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo"></xref>.
Determines whether two <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo"></xref> objects are equal.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>
The first <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo"></xref> to compare for equality.
The second <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo"></xref> to compare for equality.
`true` if the strings for a and b are equal; otherwise `false`.
Determines whether two <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo"></xref> objects are not equal.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>
The first <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo"></xref> to compare for inequality.
The second <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo"></xref> to compare for inequality.
`true` if the strings for a and b are not equal; otherwise `false`.
